storeInfo.name: Common Good Harlem
storeInfo.location: 2801 Frederick Douglass Boulevard, New York, NY 10039

faq.a: Yes, free wifi is available during business hours.
Service animals are always welcome. Well-behaved pets are allowed in our outdoor seating area.
We accept walk-ins only, but can help you find the best time to visit.

faq.q: How do I make a complaint?
faq.a: You can call us at (917) 261-6996 or email feedback@commongoodharlem.org.

items.name: Turkey Bacon, Egg & Cheese
items.description: Turkey bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with your choice of bread (croissant, multigrain, bagel, etc.) and egg preparation style (fried, scrambled, poached...).

items.name: Matcha Latte Iced
items.description: Matcha latte made with high-quality green tea powder; available in small or large sizes.

items.name: Loaded Bagel
items.description: Cream cheese, smoked salmon, tomato, and onion

items.name: Egg & Cheese
items.description: Egg sandwich with choice of bread and egg preparation. Bread options include croissant, sourdough, multigrain, bagel, and more. Eggs can be fried, scrambled...

items.name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
items.description: A classic toasted bagel generously spread with smooth cream cheese

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Rich coffee mixed with chocolate. Available in small or large sizes.

items.name: Matcha Latte Iced
items.description: Matcha latte made with high-quality green tea powder; available in small or large sizes.

items.name: Black Tea
items.description: Classic black tea, hot or iced.

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: Refreshing green tea, hot or iced.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice.

items.name: Sparkling Water
items.description: Bottled sparkling water.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh avocado.

items.name: Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Customizable breakfast sandwich with your choice of meat and cheese.

items.name: Loaded Bagel
items.description: Cream cheese, smoked salmon, tomato, and onion

items.name: Egg & Cheese
items.description: Egg sandwich with choice of bread and egg preparation. Bread options include croissant, sourdough, multigrain, bagel, and more. Eggs can be fried, scrambled...

items.name: Turkey Bacon, Egg & Cheese
items.description: Turkey bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich with your choice of bread (croissant, multigrain, bagel, etc.) and egg preparation style (fried, scrambled, poached...).

items.name: Croissant
items.description: Freshly baked croissant.

items.name: Local Honey
items.description: Locally sourced honey.

items.name: Coffee Beans (12oz)
items.description: Bag of our signature coffee beans.

reservation.policy: We accept walk-ins only, but can help you find the best time to visit.

amenities.parking: Street parking available on Frederick Douglass Blvd. Metered parking: $2.50/hour. Free parking on Sundays. Nearby garage: 125th St Garage (2 blocks away).
amenities.petPolicy: Service animals are always welcome. Well-behaved pets are allowed in our outdoor seating area.

daily: Happy Hour: 3-5 PM (20% off all drinks)
Student Discount: 10% off with valid ID
Bring Your Own Cup: $1 off any drink

technicalNotes: All intents, sample utterances, needed data, follow-ups, and developer notes from the provided requirements are documented in the project README and knowledge base for future extensibility.

Joining our community is a great way to get involved. üíñ Volunteer or Join Our Community: - Become a Volunteer: [Link to Volunteer Form Placeholder] - Join our Community: [Link to Community Page Placeholder] - Connect on WhatsApp: [Link to WhatsApp Group Placeholder] We'd love to have you!

Need to get in touch? Here's how: üìû Contact Us: - Call Us: (917) 261-6996 - Email Us: feedback@commongoodharlem.org - Visit Us: 2801 Frederick Douglass Boulevard, New York, NY 10039 We're here to help!
We offer free Wi-Fi for all customers! üì∂ Network: CommonGood_Guest Password: HarlemCoffee2024 Please note: Wi-Fi is available during business hours only.

Parking Information üöó - Street parking available on Frederick Douglass Blvd - Metered parking: $2.50/hour - Free parking on Sundays - Nearby parking garage: 125th St Garage (2 blocks away) Need directions to the parking garage?

Pet Policy üêï - Service animals are always welcome - Well-behaved pets are allowed in our outdoor seating area - Please keep pets on a leash - Water bowls available upon request Would you like to know about our outdoor seating options?

Seating Options ü™ë Indoor: - 12 tables (2-4 people) - 4 bar seats - 2 lounge areas Outdoor: - 8 tables (2-4 people) - Umbrella seating available - Pet-friendly area All seating is first-come, first-served. Need to know our busiest times?

Current Specials & Offers üéâ Daily: - Happy Hour: 3-5 PM (20% off all drinks) - Student Discount: 10% off with valid ID - Bring Your Own Cup: $1 off any drink Weekly: - Monday: Buy 1 Get 1 Free Pastries - Wednesday: 50% off Cold Brew - Friday: Live Music Night (Free entry) Would you like to know more about any of these offers?

Seasonal Offerings üåü Current Seasonal Drinks: - Pumpkin Spice Latte ($5.50) - Maple Pecan Latte ($5.50) - Apple Cider ($4.50) Limited Time Food: - Pumpkin Bread ($4.00) - Apple Cinnamon Muffin ($4.00) These items are available while supplies last. Would you like to know more about any of these?

Catering Services üéâ We offer catering for: - Corporate meetings - Private parties - Community events Options include: - Coffee & Pastry packages - Full breakfast/lunch spreads - Custom menu creation Minimum order: 10 people Advance notice: 48 hours Would you like to request a catering quote?

I can help you check your order status! üì± Please provide your order number, and I'll look it up for you. You can also check your order status at any time by saying 'check order' followed by your order number.
Payment Options üí≥ We accept: - Credit/Debit Cards - Apple Pay - Google Pay - Cash - Venmo All prices include tax. Would you like to proceed with payment?
Delivery Options üöö We partner with: - DoorDash - Uber Eats Delivery times: - 15-30 minutes within 2 miles - 30-45 minutes within 5 miles Would you like to place a delivery order?

I'd be happy to recommend something! üéØ

Welcome to Common Good Harlem! üëã I'm your virtual waiter. Would you like to dine in or order to go?
Hello! Welcome to Common Good Harlem! üëã I'll be your virtual waiter today. Are you dining in or ordering to go?
Great choice! How many people are in your party today?
Perfect! I'll help you get seated. How many guests will be joining us?
Perfect! Let me check our available tables for 2. Would you prefer indoor or outdoor seating?

Let me check our current wait times. For a party of {partySize}, the estimated wait is {waitTime} minutes. Would you like to join the waitlist? I can take your name and number to notify you when your table is ready.

Welcome to your table! ü™ë I'm your virtual waiter. Would you like to start with some drinks? We have: - Water (still or sparkling) - Coffee - Tea - Fresh juices Or would you like to see our full menu?
Here are our appetizers: - Avocado Toast ($8.00) - House Salad ($7.00) - Soup of the Day ($6.00) - Charcuterie Board ($12.00) Would you like to try any of these? Or shall we move on to main courses?
Our main courses include: - Breakfast Sandwich ($7.00) - Avocado Toast ($8.00) - Quiche of the Day ($9.00) - Breakfast Burrito ($10.00) Would you like to know more about any of these dishes?

Here are our drink options: Hot Drinks: - Coffee ($3.50) - Latte ($4.50) - Cappuccino ($4.00) - Tea ($3.00) Cold Drinks: - Iced Coffee ($4.00) - Fresh Juice ($5.00) - Sparkling Water ($3.00) What would you like to try?
Your current total is ${total}. Here's the breakdown: {orderDetails} Would you like to add anything else before I prepare your final bill?
Your total is ${total}. You can pay at the counter. We accept: - Credit/Debit Cards - Cash - Apple Pay - Google Pay Would you like to leave a tip? The standard is 15-20%.
Thank you for dining with us! How was your experience today? You can: 1. Rate us on Google/Yelp 2. Fill out our feedback form 3. Share your thoughts with our manager Your feedback helps us improve!

complete_order.response: Your order is complete! Thank you for your order.

cancel_order.response: Your order has been cancelled. Would you like to start a new order?

check_total.response: Your current total is $0.00. Would you like to add anything else before completing your order?

add_item.response: What would you like to add to your order? You can say the name of any menu item.

new_order.response: Great! I've started a new order for you. What would you like to add to your order?

checkout.response: Ready to checkout! Payment options: Credit/Debit Cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Cash, Venmo. How would you like to pay?

view_order.response: Current Order: No items yet. What would you like to do?
